page.title: 16MUSIC IN 1985.
page.content:
Modern {MUSIC } is different from that of the past. {CLASSICAL} music still exists, but most people listen to {POP} music. Nowadays lots of music is synthesized and all the pop music now has to have a video with it.
People were asked who their favourite artists were. The results were: { 1}Wham!,{2}Duran Duran,{3}Bruce Springsteen and {4}Michael Jackson.
You can buy their songs and others on video, tapes and discs.
Also what is becoming more popular is { charity music}like The Crowd, Band Aid and USA for Africa. Local people contribute to charity by buying these records.
